import React from "react"; function Signup() { const [credentials,setCredentials]=useState({name:"",emai:"",password:"",geolocation:""}) const handleSubmit=async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); const response=fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/createuser",{ mehtod:'POST', heder:{ 'Content-type':'application/json' }, body:JSON.stringify() }) } const onChange=(event)=>{ setCredentials({...credentials,[event.target.name]:event.target.value}) } return ( <>
We'll never share your email with anyone else.
Already a user
); } export default Signup;
